title: Mr. Cranky Pants
body: Who would scale two barbed-wire fences and climb into an alligator pit to steal an alligator named 'Mr. Cranky Pants'? <a href="http://www.ananova.com/news/story/sm_919687.html?menu=news.quirkies">These morons</a>.  Amazingly it's the third time an alligator has been stolen from the park in the past two years.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-04-13

Mr. Cranky Pants

Who would scale two barbed-wire fences and climb into an alligator pit to steal an alligator named 'Mr. Cranky Pants'?

bodyNavItems.text: "We're not using these robots to hand out flowers"
